definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
York Chow or Chow Yat-ngok (1947-), Hong Kong doctor and politician, Secretary for Health, Welfare and Food since 2004

sentences.english: When the markets opened the following Monday, the Dow bid adieu to 10000 for good.
sentences.chinese: 股市在紧接着的周一开盘时就告别了10000点。

sentences.english: Please send them to this address before twelve o'clock next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 请于下周一12点前把它们送到这个地址。

sentences.english: Two downtown Portland parks where Occupy Portland demonstrators camped for weeks are clear Monday and police say crews will be removing debris and assessing damage.
sentences.chinese: 波特兰两个示威者宿营的城市公园在周一得到了清理。

sentences.english: None of the auto makers disclosed a pricing strategy in Guangzhou Monday.
sentences.chinese: 周一在广州，没有任何汽车商透露定价策略。
这是一个开创性的时刻，周一。

sentences.english: Sign name for cats online activities to Monday, that is, on 6 November.
sentences.chinese: 在网上为猫征名的活动到周一，也就是本月6日结束。

sentences.english: Obama and Medvedev have scheduled a four-hour session for Monday.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马和梅德韦杰夫计划在周一举行四个小时的会谈。

sentences.english: It requires everyone to wear formal clothes from Monday to Friday.
sentences.chinese: 规定要求所有人从周一都周五必须穿正装。

sentences.english: Yamaguchi died Monday at the age of 93.
sentences.chinese: 本周一山口疆辞别了人世，享年93岁。

sentences.english: Mondays often feel like a catch-up day from the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 周一往往感觉是从周末赶过来的。

sentences.english: On Monday, "Nurse Jackie" and "United States of Tara" return for their second seasons.
sentences.chinese: 周一，《护士杰姬》和《错乱人生》将开播第二季。

sentences.english: He calls this the biggest leap since the original iPhone. See all the images from Monday's event from our live blog here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以从我们的直播博客中看到周一事件的所有照片。

sentences.english: The short-listed candidates will run off for presidency on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 入围的总统候选人将在周一进行最后的决选。

sentences.english: Google. cn still appeared to be accessible on Monday, and search-engine results continued to be filtered.
sentences.chinese: cn周一看起来仍可以访问，搜索结果仍是过滤过的。

sentences.english: No causalities have been reported, according to a statement issued by the municipal government Monday.
sentences.chinese: 没有伤亡的报道，根据市政府本周一发表声明。

sentences.english: You can begin employment next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 你下周一就可以来上班了。
